name: Light Swinging
description:
In Light Swinging fling yourself off of gravitational lights! This game is very speed-running focused. Use the player’s velocity and the gravitational pull of the lights to lunch yourself through levels. Each level has a gold, silver and bronze time to compete for and your own best time to improve each playthrough. 

Feel free to post your times in the comments! 

Controls - Move - Arrow Keys or WASD Jump - Space Restart - R
